title: Jannik Sinner outclasses Lorenzo Musetti to storm into US Open last four
description: Jannik Sinner swept aside Lorenzo Musetti in straight sets to keep his US Open defense alive, booking a semi-final with Felix Auger-Aliassime
content: Jannik Sinner continued his march toward a second consecutive US Open title on Wednesday night, dispatching the 10th-seeded Lorenzo Musetti 6-1, 6-4, 6-2 in two hours flat in the first ever all-Italian men’s quarter-final at a grand slam tournament. ... [6301 chars]

title: Labour could end badger cull but only with Covid-style testing and vaccines - report
description: Review says ministers have only ‘small chance’ of wiping out bovine tuberculosis by 2038 without more investment
content:
Labour can end the badger cull but only with a Covid-19 style focus on testing and vaccinating, the author of a government-commissioned report has said.
Ministerial plans to stop the shooting of the animals can be achieved but at a cost to the Treasu... [4418 chars]

title: US Open 2025 results: Amanda Anisimova beats Iga Swiatek to gain Wimbledon final
description: Amanda Anisimova says she rewatched her Wimbledon final defeat by Iga Swiatek to inspire her to victory over the second seed in the US Open quarter-finals.
content:
Amanda Anisimova says she rewatched her heavy Wimbledon final defeat by Iga Swiatek to inspire her to "the most meaningful victory of my life" over the second seed in the US Open quarter-finals.
Fifty-three days ago, Poland's Swiatek demolished Anisi... [1218 chars]

title: UK warned it's on course to fail in efforts to wipe out bovine TB
description: The government is aiming to eliminate the disease in cattle herds across England by 2038, but scientists say infection control and badger vaccinations must be sped up significantly for that target to be met.
content:
Controversial efforts to eliminate tuberculosis (TB) in cattle are likely to fail unless there's greater urgency and funding from the government, scientists have warned.
